markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sepulchral Sublimation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3485) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 33</row>

**Archetype** [Reanimator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=175) (Level 14)

**Prerequisites**
ability to create or control [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160); [cleric](/Classes.aspx?ID=5) with a negative font, [oracle](/Classes.aspx?ID=14) of [bones](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=3), or [necromancer](/ArcaneSchools.aspx?ID=7) [wizard](/Classes.aspx?ID=12)

**Requirements**
You have at least one undead [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) that you permanently control.

</column>

---

You repurpose the negative energy that flows through your minions at a moment's notice. Instantly destroy one undead minion within 60 feet that is permanently under your control. If your next action is to cast a [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) spell from a spell slot, you don't expend the slot. The spell's level must be half the destroyed minion's level or lower and the spell can't have a duration.

**Special** This feat has the trait matching your spellcasting tradition.
name: Sepulchral Sublimation
prerequisite: ability to create or control undead; cleric with a negative font, oracle of bones, or necromancer wizard

requirement: You have at least one undead  minion  that you permanently control.
requirement_markdown: You have at least one undead [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) that you permanently control.
